lead_paragraph: Bank stocks fell after Deutsche Bank said it would not settle with the Department of Justice over its handling of mortgage securities. Its stock skidded 9 percent.

headline.print_headline: Wall Street Lower, Closing Out a Volatile Week
headline.main: Wall Street Ends Lower, Closing Out a Volatile Week

snippet: Bank stocks fell after Deutsche Bank said it would not settle with the Department of Justice over its handling of mortgage securities. Its stock skidded 9 percent....
